alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:46PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Jackson County through 315 PM EDT... At 246 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Jefferson, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Jefferson, Commerce, Arcade, Nicholson, Peach State Speedway, Apple Valley and Westgate Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
